chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof starting with "```coq
", ending with "Qed.```", without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```coq
simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```coq
intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Solve This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
instr: Set
data: Type
one_step: instr -> state -> state -> Prop
sss_fun: forall (i : instr) (s t1 t2 : state), s ⟬ i ⦒ t1 -> s ⟬ i ⦒ t2 -> t1 = t2
sss_dec: forall (i : instr) (st1 st2 : state), {st1 ⟬ i ⦒ st2} + {~ st1 ⟬ i ⦒ st2}
P: code
ii: instr
st': state
st: state

Goal:
(fst st, ii :: nil) <sc P -> P // st :1> st' -> st ⟬ ii ⦒ st'

Premises:
Notation state := (nat * data)%type
fst : ?A * ?B -> ?A where ?A : [instr : Set data : Type one_step : instr -> state -> state -> Prop sss_fun : forall (i : instr) (s t1 t2 : state), s ⟬ i ⦒ t1 -> s ⟬ i ⦒ t2 -> t1 = t2 sss_dec : forall (i : instr) (st1 st2 : state), {st1 ⟬ i ⦒ st2} + {~ st1 ⟬ i ⦒ st2} P : code ii : instr st : state st' : state |- Type] ?B : [instr : Set data : Type one_step : instr -> state -> state -> Prop sss_fun : forall (i : instr) (s t1 t2 : state), s ⟬ i ⦒ t1 -> s ⟬ i ⦒ t2 -> t1 = t2 sss_dec :
nil : list ?A where ?A : [instr : Set data : Type one_step : instr -> state -> state -> Prop sss_fun : forall (i : instr) (s t1 t2 : state), s ⟬ i ⦒ t1 -> s ⟬ i ⦒ t2 -> t1 = t2 sss_dec : forall (i : instr) (st1 st2 : state), {st1 ⟬ i ⦒ st2} + {~ st1 ⟬ i ⦒ st2} P : code ii : instr st : state st' : state |- Type]
Tauto.X : ?TX -> Tauto.GFormula where ?TA : [instr : Set data : Type one_step : instr -> state -> state -> Prop sss_fun : forall (i : instr) (s t1 t2 : state), s ⟬ i ⦒ t1 -> s ⟬ i ⦒ t2 ->...-> t1 = t2 sss_dec : forall (i : instr) (st1 st2 : state), {st1 ⟬ i ⦒ st2} + {~ st1 ⟬ i ⦒ st2} P : code ii : instr st : state st' : state |- Type]
Tauto.D : Tauto.GFormula -> Tauto.GFormula -> Tauto.GFormula where ?TA : [instr : Set data : Type one_step : instr -> state -> state -> Prop sss_fun : forall (i : instr) (s t1 t2 : state), s ⟬ i ⦒ t1 -> s ⟬ i ⦒ t2 ->...-> t1 = t2 sss_dec : forall (i : instr) (st1 st2 : state), {st1 ⟬ i ⦒ st2} + {~ st1 ⟬ i ⦒ st2} P : code ii : instr st : state st' : state |- Type]
Tauto.A : ?TA -> ?AA -> Tauto.GFormula where ?TA : [instr : Set data : Type one_step : instr -> state -> state -> Prop sss_fun : forall (i : instr) (s t1 t2 : state), s ⟬ i ⦒ t1 -> s ⟬ i ⦒ t2 ->...-> t1 = t2 sss_dec : forall (i : instr) (st1 st2 : state), {st1 ⟬ i ⦒ st2} + {~ st1 ⟬ i ⦒ st2} P : code ii : instr st : state st' : state |- Type]

Tauto.I : Tauto.GFormula -> option ?AF -> Tauto.GFormula -> Tauto.GFormula where ?TA : [instr : Set data : Type one_step : instr -> state -> state -> Prop sss_fun : forall (i : instr) (s t1 t2 : state), s ⟬ i ⦒ t1 -> s ⟬ i ⦒ t2 ->...-> t1 = t2 sss_dec : forall (i : instr) (st1 st2 : state), {st1 ⟬ i ⦒ st2} + {~ st1 ⟬ i ⦒ st2} P : code ii : instr st : state st' : state |- Type]
VectorSpec.cons_inj : VectorDef.cons ?A ?a1 ?n ?v1 = VectorDef.cons ?A ?a2 ?n ?v2 -> ?a1 = ?a2 /\ ?v1 = ?v2 where ?A : [instr : Set data : Type one_step : instr -> state -> state -> Prop sss_fun : forall (i : instr) (s t1 t2 : state), s ⟬ i ⦒ t1 -> s ⟬ i ⦒ t2 ->...-> t1 = t2 sss_dec : forall (i : instr) (st1 st2 : state), {st1 ⟬ i ⦒ st2} + {~ st1 ⟬ i ⦒ st2} P : code ii : instr st : state st' : state |- VectorDef.t ?A ?n]
VectorDef.append : VectorDef.t ?A ?n -> VectorDef.t ?A ?p -> VectorDef.t ?A (?n + ?p) where ?A : [instr : Set data : Type one_step : instr -> state -> state -> Prop sss_fun : forall (i : instr) (s t1 t2 : state), s ⟬ i ⦒ t1 -> s ⟬ i ⦒ t2 ->...-> t1 = t2 sss_dec : forall (i : instr) (st1 st2 : state), {st1 ⟬ i ⦒ st2} + {~ st1 ⟬ i ⦒ st2} P : code ii : instr st : state st' : state |- nat]

VectorSpec.eta : forall v : VectorDef.t ?A (S ?n), v = VectorDef.cons ?A (VectorDef.hd v) ?n (VectorDef.tl v) where ?A : [instr : Set data : Type one_step : instr -> state -> state -> Prop sss_fun : forall (i : instr) (s t1 t2 : state), s ⟬ i ⦒ t1 -> s ⟬ i ⦒ t2 ->...-> t1 = t2 sss_dec : forall (i : instr) (st1 st2 : state), {st1 ⟬ i ⦒ st2} + {~ st1 ⟬ i ⦒ st2} P : code ii : instr st : state st' : state |- nat]
